project.name: fbsd
project.author: Otavio Rodolfo Piske
project.description: Running Gentoo on an FreeBSD base system.

longdescription.p: Gentoo/FreeBSD or Gentoo/FBSD is an effort to make a Gentoo experience on top of a FreeBSD base system. An experimental, yet incomplete release is present, and there's an almost complete install guide.
This project is still in its infancy. If you are interested in working on it, please send an e-mail to Stephen Bennett.
